sentences.english: Q. Which is better with Catherine, solo or group?
sentences.chinese: 对凯瑟林来说单练好还是团练好？

sentences.english: After the war, civil corps turned to the force maintaining regional order there.
sentences.chinese: 战争结束后，团练转化为维护地方秩序的力量。

sentences.english: Without whichever cause at the time that lotus taught, one province in Hubei dragged have 300,000 regiments do.
sentences.chinese: 平白莲教的时候，湖北一省就拉起了三十万团练。

sentences.english: Any competitions and trainings will be announced in this board.
sentences.chinese: 所有比赛事宜及团练会在此版公告。

sentences.english: The local military power also developed on account of bandit problems at that time.
sentences.chinese: 又因为盗匪问题，地方团练反而得以发展。

Green standard army, standing infantry during Qing dynasty, originally formed from Ming and other Chinese army units

historical communal administrative and self-defence system created during the Song Dynasty and revived during the Republican Era, in which households are grouped in jia 甲[jia3] and jia are grouped in bao 保[bao3]
Nian Army, leading a peasant rebellion against the Qing dynasty in Shandong, Henan, Jiangsu and Anhui 1851-1868, at the same time as the Taiping Rebellion further south
